00046             function                attach_file( $Options )
00047             {
00048                   try
00049                   {
00050                         $FileInputController = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_controller' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00051                         
00052                         if( $FileInputController->UploadedFile )
00053                         {
00054                               $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00055                               $GalleryAlgorithms = get_package( 'gallery::gallery_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00056                               
00057                               $GalleryId = $Security->get_gp( 'gallery_id' , 'integer' );
00058                               $FileId = get_field( $FileInputController->UploadedFile , 'id' );
00059                               
00060                               $GalleryAlgorithms->attach_file( $GalleryId , $FileId );
00061                         }
00062                   }
00063                   catch( Exception $e )
00064                   {
00065                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00066                   }
00067             }

00087             function                detach_file( $Options )
00088             {
00089                   try
00090                   {
00091                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00092                         
00093                         $GalleryId = $Security->get_gp( 'gallery_id' , 'integer' );
00094                         $FileId = $Security->get_gp( 'file_id' , 'integer' );
00095                         
00096                         $GalleryAlgorithms = get_package( 'gallery::gallery_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00097                         $GalleryAlgorithms->detach_file( $GalleryId , $FileId );
00098                   }
00099                   catch( Exception $e )
00100                   {
00101                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00102                   }
00103             }

00130                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_gallery_detach_file' );
00131
